name: One Man Crew (Patello)
description:
As a lonely pirate, you'll have to make food and store it before you starve to death.  Be careful, however, as lightning, rats, and squid try to ruin your voyage. 

To restore rations, click and move the player from the kitchen (middle deck) to the storage room (bottom deck).

Move to the crow's nest to see upcoming threats.

Have fun! Bon voyage!

Made for the GMTK 2020 Game Jam
